title: Our future as a species is bleak.
body:
I don't think global warming or nukes are going to kill us off, but it will be technology.

I am not talking about any Skynet shit either.

Think of this for a second. In the future you will have Near perfect VR, slave robotics, mind manipulation, and artificial enhancements.

If we don't get addicted to VR, we will all have the ability to unleash our dormant depraved personalities on AI/robots with no repercussions.

If we are stil able to function, we will have to not become addicted to neural imlants that can make us feel anything we want. And if that is still not enough we are going to have artificially enhanced humans having dispersonaliztion disorders.

We fucked.
